message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. That's a bit more than I was hoping to spend. I'd be willing to pay $150 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can do $165, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit.  $165 is still a bit higher than my budget. How about $155?  I'm really interested in the product, but I can't go much higher than that.
